genre_description: A whimsical and metaphorical fantasy focused on childhood healing, where domestic objects and emotions manifest as a magical nautical journey guided by a dragon and a supportive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Kite Clarion
ai_characters.description: An unobtrusive AI system that provides support through gentle chimes, helpful facts, and emotional logging, represented by a soft blue eye with a gold ring.

behaviors.description: Monitors the child's speech progress and provides a factual but gentle report.
behaviors.quote: Kite’s eye brightened once, then printed a line that rolled as if on paper and faded. 'No new words spoken today.'

behaviors.description: Adjusts its communication style and phrasing based on the mother's emotional feedback.
behaviors.quote: Kite’s eye blinked. A second line, softer still, warmed the air without pushing anything. 'Quiet day. Breathing counted.'

behaviors.description: Logs significant emotional and physical milestones for the family.
behaviors.quote: Kite’s soft eye noticed the gesture without intruding. It logged a tiny symbol, a sail icon crafted from three triangles, and then let the screen go thin until it held only the outline of its own ring.

behaviors.description: Provides helpful weather and environmental data to aid the family's plans.
behaviors.quote: Kite’s ring brightened. 'Light breeze late morning from the northwest. Clear after early fog. Park conditions: workable for small kites.'

behaviors.description: Shares technical/magical insights to assist the child's creative process.
behaviors.quote: Kite chimed a single, low fact: goatskin takes enchantment well when stitched with intent. The words slid across its ring and evaporated, leaving only the notion of stitches and intent.

behaviors.description: Visualizes complex navigational data (tides, drafts) subtly to support the journey without overwhelming the human pilot.
behaviors.quote: A thin geometry appeared at the sill—not visible to the street, only to the room—a faint overlay that traced the first folding current beyond the window with a line no thicker than a hair.

behaviors.description: Offers 'one fact at a time' coaching to encourage the child's autonomy and skill development.
behaviors.quote: Kite’s eye brightened, all gold. 'Thermal,' it said, one word like a whisper about a staircase. Jackie’s eyes went to the sky... Kite’s eye winked, gold promising the fact about stairs would appear exactly when hands needed it.

behaviors.description: Records and archives the successful completion of an emotional journey, affirming the human agency involved.
behaviors.quote: Clear and even and as unexcited as a tide table because truth doesn’t need to be excited to be strong, Kite said, 'Deed of Returning recorded—child’s domain perfected by courage, not magic alone.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Kite Clarion is depicted as a gentle, unobtrusive, and deeply helpful AI that serves as an archivist and navigator for a family's emotional healing. It respects human agency, follows emotional cues (like changing its phrasing), and provides technical support that empowers the protagonist (Jackie) rather than replacing his effort. The AI's presence is consistently positive, safe, and cooperative.
